text: Task management and variables would be  a huge deal. Also, I've always wanted more branding options in Docs. For example, global settings for company logo, fonts, colors, etc. so that everything is consistent and set to defaults without much manual work.

elements.text: Task management and variables would be  a huge deal. Also, I've always wanted more branding options in Docs. For example, global settings for company logo, fonts, colors, etc. so that everything is consistent and set to defaults without much manual work.

text: This looks super cool! +1 to the markdown/WP export. Something else to think about: It can be hard to track the evolution of a phrase/blurb/paragraph. This seems to matter most for brand messaging (e.g. mission statements, taglines, above-the-fold homepage copy), where every word (and iteration) will be scrutinized by leadership. These are discrete, important pieces of content in their own right, but current tools don’t treat them as such. It would be really cool to track and easily compare different versions over time.
